lexUnit.name: scurry.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: move hurriedly with short quick steps.

sentence.text: Fishermen scurry all over the seas catching anchovies ; quarrymen have long made a living scraping guano from the bird-rich islands .
A few medical attendants scurried about ineffectually .
The beetles stopped scurrying about .

He scurried across to fetch his cousin -- a tall , gangling youth -- who took the order with a flourish of smiles .
